thought: The Slack action is failing due to missing or incorrect parameters. We need to provide the required parameters explicitly, especially the 'select' and 'channelId' fields with correct types.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to specify sending message to a channel.
Set 'channelId' parameter with mode 'name' and value 'general' to target #general channel.
Set 'text' parameter with the conversation text from aiCompletion output.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple text message.
Test the Slack action with these parameters to ensure message is sent successfully.
criticism: Currently, the Slack action has empty params which causes the workflow execution failure.

tool_input.comments: Send the generated conversation to Slack #general channel with proper parameters.
TODO: Test sending message to Slack #general channel.
